content.title: TDC17 Production & Shipping Update, Mar 3.
content.creator:
Rythmagica Team
March 3, 2025
content.content:
Dear TDC17 Supporters,
We‚Äôre excited to share the latest TDC17 production update with you! Everything is progressing according to schedule, and we appreciate your patience and support. Here‚Äôs where things stand:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Production on Track ‚Äì This week, we will complete the final assembly of the TDC17 and begin quality control checks. The packaging boxes are currently in production and are expected to be completed and delivered next week.
2Ô∏è‚É£ New Drumsticks in Development ‚Äì The F5 drumsticks, designed specifically for the TDC17, are in production. We‚Äôve also designed two additional models, F3 and F8, all 37cm in length. Since each requires its own mold, adjustments have taken longer than expected. Additionally, the current production yield needs improvement. While this has caused some delays in this part of production, it does not impact the overall timeline.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Shipping Schedule ‚Äì We are still on track for the first batch of TDC17 shipments to begin on March 15 as planned.
Thank you again for your patience and support! We‚Äôll continue to keep you updated as we move closer to shipping. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.
Best,
rythmagica team

content.title: üéâ TDC17 Crowdfunding Successfully Completed ‚Äì Thank You!
content.creator:
Rythmagica Team
February 16, 2025
content.content:
Dear TDC17 Supporters,
We are beyond thrilled to announce that the TDC17 crowdfunding campaign has been a huge success!  Our initial goal was 3,000 SGD, but thanks to your incredible support, we reached an amazing 43,000 SGD! This wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without each and every one of you‚Äîthank you from the bottom of our hearts!
From the very beginning of the campaign, we simultaneously started production to ensure a smooth delivery process. We‚Äôre happy to report that all production stages are progressing as planned, and the first batch of TDC17 units is expected to ship by mid-March.
We‚Äôll continue to provide updates on the production progress, and of course, if you have any questions or would like to reach out, feel free to contact us anytime!
Your support means everything to us, and we can‚Äôt wait for you to experience the TDC17! ü•Å
Best regards,
Rythmagica Team
